# School Board Meeting Minutes
## September 10, 2024

### Call to Order
Board President Sarah Chen called the meeting to order at 7:00 PM.

### Board Members Present
- Sarah Chen, President
- Michael Rivera, Vice President
- Jennifer Adams
- Robert Kim
- Lisa Thompson

### Superintendent's Report
Dr. Amanda Foster reported on the start of the 2024-25 school year:
- Enrollment: 12,450 students (up 2.3% from last year)
- New hires: 45 teachers, 12 support staff
- Facility projects: Summer HVAC work completed on schedule

### Action Items

#### Technology Procurement Authorization
The board considered a request to issue an RFP for the Learning Management System upgrade.

Discussion:
- Current system contract expires June 2025
- Budget allocated in FY2025: $450,000
- Timeline: RFP October, selection December, implementation Spring 2025

Motion by Rivera, seconded by Adams, to authorize the RFP. Passed 5-0.

#### Facilities Bond Measure
Board discussed placing a $15M facilities bond on the March 2025 ballot. Community forums scheduled for October and November.

### Public Comment
Parent Association President noted support for technology initiatives.

### Adjournment
Meeting adjourned at 9:15 PM.
